alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Panola; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 8:32PM CDT until October 12 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Yalobusha County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 832 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of George Payne State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Water Valley, Bruce, Pittsboro, Banner, Velma, Shepherd, Benwood, Skuna, Shuford, Pine Valley, Ellard and Sarepta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
